titleStmt.title: Vlysses vpon Aiax. Written by Misodiaboles to his friend Philaretes
titleStmt.author: Misodiaboles.
Harington, John, Sir, 1560-1612.

notesStmt.note: Misattributed to Sir John Harington; in fact a reply to his: A new discourse of a stale subject, called the metamorphosis of Ajax.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
